org.chrisjr.loom.time

Class Scheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.chrisjr.loom.time.Scheduler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NonRealTimeScheduler, RealTimeScheduler

    public abstract class Scheduler
extends Object
    The base class for schedulers in Loom.
    Author:
    chrisjr

      static class  Scheduler.State
      The state of the scheduler.

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static BigFraction DEFAULT_RESOLUTION
      One millisecond at standard playback speed.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_RESOLUTION

        public static final BigFraction DEFAULT_RESOLUTION
        One millisecond at standard playback speed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Scheduler

        public Scheduler()

    • Method Detail

      • getElapsedMillis

        public abstract long getElapsedMillis()
        Implementations of the Scheduler class must provide the present time when queried.
        Returns:
        the number of milliseconds elapsed

      • getNow

        public BigFraction getNow()
        Returns the current time in milliseconds divided by the period.
        Returns:
        the present moment as a fraction of a cycle

      • getCurrentInterval

        public Interval getCurrentInterval()
        Retrieves an Interval that extends before and after the current instant by half the minimum resolution.
        Returns:
        an interval

      • play

        public void play()
        Start playback. Must be called before querying the scheduler!

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Pause playback.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop playback. Additional queries to the scheduler will throw an exception until play() is called again.

      • getPeriod

        public long getPeriod()

      • getMinimumResolution

        public BigFraction getMinimumResolution()

      • getHalfMinimum

        public BigFraction getHalfMinimum()

      • setPeriod

        public void setPeriod(long periodMillis)
        Sets the period of the scheduler.
        Parameters:
        periodMillis - the new period

      • update

        public void update()
        Runs all callbacks associated with the current interval.

      • updateFor

        public void updateFor(Interval interval)
        Runs all callbacks for a given interval. If a pattern is made of discrete events, the callback for each event will be called individually. For a continuous pattern, only one callback will be called.
        Parameters:
        interval - the interval over which to run callbacks

      • getPatternsWithActiveMappings

        public PatternCollection getPatternsWithActiveMappings()
        Retrieve the patterns that we must query for callbacks.
        Returns:
        the patterns that have external mappings

      • setPatterns

        public void setPatterns(PatternCollection patterns)
        Sets the PatternCollection associated with this scheduler, needs for active mappings.
        Parameters:
        patterns - the patterns to manage with this scheduler
